p: For the kinetics experiment, 5 female BALB/c mice (6–7 weeks old) were infected intranasally with a sublethal dose (103 pfu/50μl DMEM) of recombinant PA mut, PB2 mut or PB2/PA mut influenza viruses, or were mock-infected (50μl DMEM). Mice were euthanized at 1, 2, 4 and 7 dpi by CO2 inhalation and necropsied.
